resources.string: Hello! I\'m Michael Cali, a Computer Science graduate student at Syracuse University with a passion for technology, aiming to delve deep into machine learning and autonomous systems. My academic pursuits are matched by my love for the outdoors, believing that nature fuels creativity and sharpens problem-solving skills. I\'m on a quest to contribute to technological advancements that benefit humanity and our planet, while embracing every opportunity to learn, grow, and explore new challenges.
